prompts: Create a fire-type Pokemon with fluffy tails and bright orange fur.
I want a Pokemon that embodies warmth and has an energetic personality.
Generate an adorable creature with vibrant colors and a playful demeanor.
Make a creature that thrives in warm habitats with a fierce combat style.
Imagine a fiery Pokemon with distinctive ear shapes and a cute appearance.
Design a Pokemon that has a unique combination of orange and yellow features.
Show me a Pokemon with a bold personality and a strong affinity for fire.
